title: Fix Admin Dashboard accessibility from Profile page

requirements.summary: Display 'Admin Dashboard' button on Profile page for admin user SHUBOWNER2026 that navigates to /admin route, hidden for non-admin users
acceptanceCriteria: When logged in as SHUBOWNER2026, the Profile page shows an 'Admin Dashboard' button/link.
Clicking the 'Admin Dashboard' button navigates to the admin dashboard page (/admin).
The 'Admin Dashboard' button is completely absent for all non-admin users.

The AdminDashboardPage renders correctly at /admin and shows all sub-sections (Total Users, Monetization Requests, Payout Requests, Send Notifications, Edit User Stats, Event Control, Strikes Panel, Creator Management, Embed Video).
Navigating directly to /admin as a non-admin user redirects to the home page or login page.

file_operations.description: Add conditional rendering of an 'Admin Dashboard' button/link visible only when the logged-in user is the admin (secretUsername === 'SHUBOWNER2026'). Place the button prominently in the action buttons section alongside analytics, monetization, and logout buttons. The button should navigate to the /admin route when clicked. Ensure the button is completely hidden for non-admin users by checking both the isAdmin flag from AuthContext and the secretUsername from the user profile.

requirements.summary: Verify admin route guard in App.tsx correctly checks isAdmin flag and redirects unauthenticated or non-admin users away from /admin/* routes
acceptanceCriteria: AuthContext sets isAdmin to true only when the logged-in user's secret username matches SHUBOWNER2026.
All /admin/* routes are protected by the admin guard and redirect non-admin or unauthenticated users.

Admin dashboard sub-pages (creator management, strikes, monetization requests, payout requests, notifications sender, stats editor, event control, embed video) are all reachable via navigation links within the admin dashboard.

file_operations.description: Review and verify that the admin route guard correctly checks the isAdmin flag from AuthContext for all /admin/* routes. Ensure that unauthenticated or non-admin users are redirected to either the home page or login page. Confirm that all admin sub-routes (AdminCreatorManagementPage, AdminStrikesPanelPage, AdminMonetizationRequestsPage, AdminPayoutRequestsPage, AdminNotificationSenderPage, AdminUserStatsEditorPage, AdminEventControlPage, AdminEmbedVideoPage) are properly protected by the same guard and are registered in the route tree.

Review the isAdmin flag logic to ensure it is set to true only when the logged-in user's secretUsername matches 'SHUBOWNER2026'. Verify that the admin flag is properly synchronized with the session state and persisted via localStorage helpers. Ensure the flag is cleared on logout.

Verify that the loginUser function returns or sets the isAdmin flag based on the secretUsername matching 'SHUBOWNER2026'. Confirm that the hardcoded admin credentials (Secret Username: SHUBOWNER2026 / Password: Shubhro@007) are correctly checked during login and that the admin flag is returned in the session data.
